meanings.definition: Consisting of or characterized by separate pieces or sections.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle was a piecewise challenge, with each section requiring a different strategy.
meanings.sent2: The piecewise quilt was made up of various fabric squares sewn together.
meanings.sent3: The piecewise cake looked like a patchwork of different flavors, but surprisingly tasted delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her piecewise artwork combined different textures to create a unique masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The piecewise design of the garden incorporated various plants to create a harmonious landscape.

meanings.definition: Divided into separate parts or sections, especially when each part or section has a different characteristic or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The piecewise schedule allowed each team member to focus on their specific tasks.
meanings.sent2: The piecewise nature of the project meant that collaboration was essential for success.
meanings.sent3: The piecewise traffic flow in the city made for an interesting driving experience.
meanings.sent4: Her piecewise personality traits made her a complex and intriguing individual.
meanings.sent5: The piecewise structure of the novel kept readers engaged as they uncovered each character's story.
